description.zh: 本課程旨在培養設計與實作軟體定義無線網路的能力。軟體定義網路由控制平面、資料平面與網路功能虛擬化等技術所構成，透過資料平面/控制平面設計，以軟體定義封包傳輸方式。本課程著重於這些軟體定義網路的技術於無線網路的設計，包含應用軟體定義網路在物聯網及 5G 通訊系統。本課程以實習方式利用 OpenFlow 實作控制器及交換器，使學生透過資料平面與控制平面技術的開發，瞭解軟體定義網路對於無線網路的影響。
description.en: This course covers theoretical foundations and applications in the design of software-defined networking (SDN) for wireless network. The outline of this course is given as follows: 1. Introduction of OpenFlow; 2. Data Plane; 3. Control Plane; 4. Network Function Virtualization (NFV); 5. SDN for Internet of Things (IoT); 6. SDN of 5G System.

notes: 電子大四與電子所合開

description.zh: 生物工程和醫療技術的研究和發展，在最近幾十年中，促成明確的臨床醫學和衛生保健的進步。這些領域的發展，開啟了生物工程、臨床技術和醫學信息領域課程的蓬勃發展；目前，各大學及研究所多有提供這些領域的課程。然而，大多數參與者多來自工程背景，因此學習生物科學和醫學應用於工程思維及模式，方能使得工程師和醫生之間的科學能無礙地交流。這項課程主要是為了使主修工程及材料的學生提供具有實用性的人體結構和組織的原則及相互依存的細胞和組織器官的生理系統進行有用的學習。雖然課程可能無法全然覆蓋所有生物醫學工程領域的基礎，但在這個學習過程中，我們將專注於大多數生物醫學工程以及生技和組織工程從事的主要研發領域作出努力。這門課程是醫學和工程及材料之間的橋樑。這將是促進各類工程及設計師和醫事人員之間文化和科學的交通和相互研習課程，促進生物醫學工程的創新發現和發展。在這個過程中，我們將提供一系列的生物學和醫學知識和方法，應用在工程、材料和電子領域，旨在幫助他們能將其整和連接，可以開始從工程進入生物醫學工程的專業，或者提供工程師期許能“簡單”理解特定臨床醫療科學和技術。經由醫學背景引導進入此領域，將結合工程及材料師長的經
description.en: Research and development in bioengineering and medical technology, conducted during recent decades, have led to spectacular progress in clinical medicine and healthcare. These achievements have triggered an enormous increase in the number courses offered in the areas of bioengineering, clinical technology and medical informatics; nowadays, most major universities offer curricula oriented towards these fields. The majority of participants however come from engineering background and so modules dealing with basic biological and medical sciences have been included, to the detriments of scientific exchanges between engineers and medical doctors. This study is primarily to give those majoring in the electronic and engineering students a useful glimpse of the principles of human structure and organization and of the interdependence of cellular and organ physiological systems. Although it is no possible to cover all of the biomedical engineering domains in this course, we will have made an e

notes: 電子大三大四與電子所合開

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 1.MOS元件工作模式及MOSFET原理 2.微小MOSFET的額外考慮 3.矽晶圓的生長 4.擴 散 5.離子植入 6.氧化處理 7.CVD技術 8.微影術 9.蒸鍍與濺鍍 10.光罩製作 11.CMOS IC製程
description.en: 1. Operating modes and theory of MOS devices. 2. Small-geometry effects. 3. Wafer growth. 4. Diffusion. 5. Ion implantation. 6. Oxidation. 7. CVD techniques. 8. Lithography. 9. Sputtering and evaporation. 10. Photo masking. 11. CMOS IC fabrication processing.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計類比濾波器,進而能培養學生具有設計類比濾波器的能力,課程內容包念： 1.簡介 2.低雜訊放大器 3.混波器 4.振盪器5.頻率合成器 6.功率放大器 7. 類比基頻訊號處理
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of analog filter. Therefore, the student has the design capability of analog filter integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1. Introduction 2.LNA 3.Mixer 4.Oscillators 5.Frequency Synthesizers 6.Power Amplifier 7.Analog Baseband Signal Processing

description.zh: 本課程在研習類比積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前類比CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.類比設計概述2.基本MOS元件物理特性3.單級放大器4.差動放大器5.頻率響應6.雜訊分析7.回授8.運算放大器9.振盪器10.鎖相迴路
description.en: This course is concerned with the analog integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of analog CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction o analog design2.Basic MOS device physics3.Single-stage amplifiers4.Differential amplifiers5.Frequency response6.Noise7.Feedback8.Operational amplifiers9.Oscillators10.Phase-locked loops

description.zh: 1.微波傳輸線2.微波元件3.微波材料4.微波量測5.微波傳輸轉換6.微波耦合7.微波濾波器8.微波天線
description.en: 1.Microware Transmission Lines2.Microware Elements3.Microware Matericals4.Microware Measurements5.Microware Transitions6.Microware Couplers7.Microware Filters8.Microware Antennas

description.zh: 本課程從基礎聲學開始介紹電聲元件的原理，進而講授電聲元件揚聲器及麥克風、電聲元件的類比電路分析法、音箱設計、電聲元件的量測方法以及音箱設計軟體的應用，帶引學生進入電聲學的領域。
description.en: This course first introduces principles of electro-acoustic transducers from fundamental acoustics. Then topics in the lectures including introduction of moving-coil loudspeaker and microphone, analog circuits analysis method for  electro- acoustic transducers , loudspeaker enclosure design, measurement test of electro-acoustic transducers and the application of loudspeaker enclosure design software. The aim of this course is to bring students into the field of Electro-Acoustics.

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 透過原理解說與系統實作，使學生熟悉雲端平台(PaaS，Platform as a Service)所提供之服務，以開發雲端應用及行動軟體。課程內容包括：雲端技術簡介，服務平台程式設計介面，ASP.NET MVC應用開發環境，Windows Azure技術架構，SQL Azure 技術架構，Windows Identity Foundation技術架構，Google App Engine技術架構，Facebook社群應用技術架構，期末專題設計等。
description.en: To provide students with the knowledge and skills to develop cloud applications and mobile apps based on typical cloud platform services.  Course spans a variety of cloud platform technologies such as ASP.NET MVC, Windows Azure, SQL Azure, Windows Identity Foundation for Cloud Security, Google App Engine, and Facebook API. Lessons guide students through a class project and take-home assignments.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹如何將金融操作的方式，以明確的程式去定義、描述與執行。內容包括: 程式交易概論、科學分析方法、程式交易技術基礎、金融投資與交易策略、交易策略回測系統開發、即時交易執行系統開發、演算法交易、高頻交易、程式交易實務應用。
description.en: This course is to instruct students how to utilize programming techniques to define, describe, and execute financial operations. The course will cover basic introduction, scientific analysis methods, programming basics, financial investment and trading strategies, back-testing, real time execution, algorithmic trading, high frequency trading, and program trading practical applications.

notes: 資財四與資財所合開/人數限制60人/科研243教室

description.zh: 本課程藉由觀察並分析消費者的決策過程以及他們對各式產品所抱持之態度，來了解其消費行為。消費者為什麼又是如何作出他們最終的消費抉擇？在消費過程當中，他們的思考及行動是如何運作的？完成消費行為之後，他們是否對自己的決定感到滿意？在本課程中，多項與消費者行為息息相關之概念及主題將會一一於課堂中討論（如：感知及認知、人類行為、使用者經驗、人因工程、人本設計、制度規範、產品開發等等）。
description.en: This course will focus on the understanding of consumer behavior through consumers' decision-making processes as well as consumers' attitudes towards certain products. How and why do consumers make their consumption choices, how do they think and act during the processes, and do they feel satisfied or dissatisfied with their decisions? Various underlying concepts and topics will be discussed (e.g. perception and cognition, human behavior, user experience, ergonomics, human-centered design, policy and social norms, product development, etc.)

description.zh: 產品研發創新管理課程主要對象為有興趣從事企業產品研發創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹基礎發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。主要內容包含如何辨識企業產品研發創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。 其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在產品研發創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的產品研發創新工具或取更好的工作機會
description.en: Production R&D Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering Production R&D development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem of Production R&D; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches to Production R&D innovation. Objective: To develop an understanding of innovation toolkits and systematic innovation approach to help students making better understanding in Production R&D innovation management and equipping with the innovation skills needed to pursue a viable career option.

description.zh: 本課程在培養同學創業的知識與思維，以及了解營運模式如何應用在商業活動裡。本課程包含: 創業精神的想法和行動、從失敗中學習、設計思考、市場測試、機會衡量、營運模式建立、價值主張、永續經營、企業倫理等議題。
description.en: The course is to encourage students to have the ideas of entrepreneurship and to establish the abilities of running a business. This course is focused on: entrepreneurial thought and action, learning from failure、design thinking、opportunity evaluation、market tests、the development of business model、value propositions、network、sustainable and business ethics.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生學習如何做財務投資決策，使得商業或工業的投資專案得到最大投資效益或最經濟的成本，課程主題包含：投資環境的定義、投資專案評估方法、利率及通膨率、資產折舊、所得稅、專案現金流量分析、專案投資風險與不確定性、實質選擇權、商業及工業投資案例研討。本課程中將考量專案投資分析的各種影響因素，使得決策者可以更有效地做出投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students how to make smart financial decisions in an effort to create economical products. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, depreciation, income taxes, developing project cash flows, uncertainty and risk, real options, special topics of business and engineering decision. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

description.zh: 資訊科技不斷進步，數位化應用從生活到工作上都變得不可或缺，也是奠定個人與企業競爭力的基礎。本課程旨在探討企業面臨產業競爭、轉型數位型企業時之議題、如何轉型及其營運模式之規畫等議題。除外相關個案之研討含教學個案及實際產業個案亦包含本課程中。
description.en: Information technology continues to progress, digital applications from life to work have become indispensable, but also lay the foundation for personal and business competitiveness. This course aims to explore issues such as the challenges of industrial competition, the transformation of digital enterprises, how to transform and its business model. Examples of related cases and industrial cases are included in this course.

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛生產與行銷較一般商品所涵蓋的範疇複雜，如車輛製造管理、新車市場行銷、中古車通路、售後服務到融資與保險等的關連性，使之瞭解其間的重要性，並使其對未來車輛產業的職場認識有助益外，又可增添其在就業市場上的競爭機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the vehicle production and marketing in the part of production preparation, mass production control, new car marketing, used car marketing, after service, insurance, etc. The purpose of this course is to increase students' knowledge of vehicle industry and enhance students' competitive advantage.

description.zh: 本課程旨於培訓職場專業英文教學師資, 以因應在未來對專門領域及用途英語文教學師資之趨勢。在一般普通英文教師需求已近飽合的現況且對專業英文教學的新需求潮流下,建構新的專業用途英語教學內容及方法為本課程之宗旨及目標。本所應用語言組課程之主軸為以應用語言學為導向之專業英語研究及應用的人才,除培養專業英文應用能力以期研究所畢業生在業界專業領域中以優勢英語文能力為基礎,厚植專業發展潛能。而針對未來對專門領域及用途英語文教學師資之需求,以專業英文研究為基礎輔以強化ESP課程設計及課堂教學法，方能成功轉換普通英文教師角色至ESP/EPP教學。畢業生未來可於大學,政府部門,私人企業,及專門提供專業英文教學機構中,從事專業英文職前及在職英文訓練教師。
description.en: When it comes to ESL/EFL teaching and learning, traditional teaching methodology has its major emphasis on theories of teaching and learning general English.  Methods and approaches in the ESL/EFL classrooms, material implementation, course design and assessment do not meet the demands in the fast-growing market for function-specific professional English teaching personnel. While the pedagogical courses acknowledges the importance and necessity of preparing students with the ESL / EFL teaching basics, it is particularly our mission to expand the ESL /EFL horizon into a new realm of ESP/EPP-specific teaching contexts with the necessary tools, resources, and techniques in implementing ESP/ EPP courses. Quarrying out knowledge from both English pedagogy and ESP / EPP theories and applications, students are prepared to establish the tailor-developed ESP / EPP programs for specific industries and corporations for pre-career training and in-job trainings as well. From diagnostic needs analys

name.en: Syntax: Theory and Application in English Teaching

description.zh: 本課程的目的是複習英語的句子結構，以獲得對語法形式更深層的瞭解，包含各種描述性或理論性的分析方法。藉著採用不同英語教學方法，這種瞭解與知識有助於解答在英語教學上所遭遇的各種學習歷程的問題，尤其是寫作和翻譯的學習過程中。
description.en: This course reviews the sentence structures in English for a deeper understanding of grammatical constructions, including various descriptive and theoretical approaches to representing them. By applying various English teaching methods, such knowledge can be helpful in dealing with problems that are frequently encountered when carrying out various learning activities in the classroom, especially essay writing and translation activities.

description.zh: 1.光纖通訊系統介紹 2.光纖種類及特性 3.訊號的退化 4.發光器5.接收器 6.中繼站及光放大器 7.數位傳輸系統 8.光固子及DWDM系統
description.en: 1.Introduction to optical fiber communications.2.Optical fibers-losses and fabrications3.Signal degradation4.Light emitters5.Optical receivers6.Repeaters and optical amplifier7.Digital communications8.Solitions and dense wavelength-division multiplexing   tgdi systems

description.zh: 本課程主要在講述工業催化製程開發之基本原則，管理方法，技術突破的執行要領及策略運用，並探討數個工業催化製程開發成功與失敗的實際案例。授課內容從化工產品的生產技術演變特性及組織架構，歷史經驗的分析開始。產品以石化產品為例，論及原料來源的轉變，工廠設備技術的進步。進而講述工業催化製程在工業催化劑功能開發及製程技術革新下，雙管齊下，如何達成工業催化製程開發的目標。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce the basic principles, management, skills to reach technology break-through, and strategy for the development of industrial catalytic process. Real cases of the success and failure of development of industrial catalytic process in chemical industry will also be reviewed. Contents of the lectures will start with the analysis of the evolution, the industry structures and historical experience of chemical industrial products.      Using petrochemical products as examples, we will discuss the shift of the raw materials, the progress of plant equipments,  and how chemical engineers simultaneously address the developments of improved catalyst and process technology to accomplish the mission of the development of catalytic process in chemical industry.

notes: 化工大三大四與化工所合開

description.zh: 本課程以講授工業用計算機網路中實體層、媒體存取控制與邏輯連結層為主。在實體層中，將討論到目前廣泛於工業上使用的實體媒介。在媒體存取控制上，則討論乙太網路，記號匯流排與記號環網路為主。媒體存取控制也包含目前廣泛於各類控制器上使用的控制區域網路 (CAN Bus)。在邏輯連結層上，主要討論路由器使用的路由協定與路由演算法。
description.en: The main subjects of this course include physical layer, media access control and logic link layer. Popular physical layer medium are discussed first. Media access control sub-layer that includes Ether-Net, Token Bus and Token Ring are the main subjects in the second portion. The contents of the media access control also include CAN bus which is widely used in various controllers. Routing protocol used by routers are discussed in third portion of this course.

description.zh: 本課程以講授高等精密量測之原理與技術為主，課程包括下列主題：精密量測概論，幾何誤差分析，系統誤差分析，機器體積誤差計算及自動化補償技術，表面粗糙度之精密量測與分析，智慧型量測系統設計，奈米量測，微光機電量測及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced principles and techniques used in Precision Metrology (PM). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction, geometric errors analysis, system errors analysis, machine volumetric errors and automatic compensation, surface roughness measurement and analysis, design of intelligent measurement systems, and conclusion.

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹最佳控制之相關原理與應用，內容包括如下：最佳控制簡介，性能指標，動態規劃法，變分法, 變分法在最佳控制之應用，最佳控制之數值解與個案研究等。
description.en: English Description:  This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and applications of optimal control. The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction of optimal control, performance measure, dynamic programming, calculus of variations, variational approach to optimal control problems, numerical solution of optimal control, and case studies.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

name.en: Literature Research in Design and Research Strategy

description.zh: 講授設計相關學術研究的基本特質與科學方法的傳統。本課程旨在介紹蒐集研究資料的 方法、文獻探討的方法與策略，並探討各種研究方法的特質與限制，引導學生以策略性 的思考進行文獻探討並架構適當的設計研究策略，進而得以研擬具可行性的研究計劃。
description.en: Lecture on theories of academic research and characteristic of science approaches in research. This course focuses on conducting an design research and presenting learners with a variety of research methods. Through the classes, this course aims to conduct individuals through the process of (1) strategic literature research, (2) constructing proper research strategies and finally (3) organize feasible research plans.

notes: 創新所與設計博所合開

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(三)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(III)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

name.zh: 老人醫學工程專題討論

description.zh: 1.醫機：生醫機械 (例如微型生物晶片)醫學機械2.醫材：生醫材料3.醫電：醫學電子，研發穿戴或植入感測器以及體液快速檢測晶片，旨在(a)建立人體健康早期預警偵測網，避免人體自身健康防護網的漏洞與延遲(例如早中期肝病 早中期癌症等缺乏疼痛徵狀的疾病)，(b)配合量身訂製的藥物，建立人體與疾病共存外加型回饋偵測網。4.醫化：醫學生化5.醫美：醫學美容：青春永駐的技術，除皺、防皺、雕塑瘦身、假髮或生髮技術、染髮與變髮技術、換膚技術、延緩老化的技術、骨質緊密技術。6.醫保：醫學保健、運動健身、心理
description.en: 1.Bio-medical machinery (such as micro-bio-chip) medical machinery 2.Bio-Medical Materials 3.Medical Electronics, worn or implanted sensors as well as the development of chips for rapid detection of body fluids 4.Medical Biochemistry 5.Medical Beauty6.Medical care

description.zh: 先修課程：電子學或應用電子學、或負責教授同意。探討PN接面之特性、短通道效應、表面通道技術原理、費米能階等基本元件物理、及0.25-0.18微米以下需明瞭元件物理知識。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, sub-half micro CMOS device, characteristics of P/N junction, short channel effect, surface channel N/P device, Fermi-level etc. The relative physical knowledge of 0.25 um device is discussed as well.

description.zh: 老人醫學基礎、 老人藥物學概論、 老人預防醫學概論、 老人醫療倫理與醫療效益概論、 老人永續照護概論 、老人感染與傳染病防治概論、老人精神照護概論、老人一般醫學概論、 老人急重症醫學概論、 老人醫療與生活科技技術概論
description.en: 1. General principle of aging  2. Geriatric pharmacy  3. Preventive geriatrics  4. Ethics and medical effects in geriatrics  5. Perpetual geriatric care  6. Infections management and prevention in elderly  7. Psychogeriatric care  8. General geriatrics 9. Geriatric emergency medical care 10. LOHAS (Lifestyles of Health and Sustainability) technology,

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹自動化光學精密檢測相關技術，內容包括如下：前言，精密量測概論，機器視覺原理，二維光學檢測技術及實習，三維光學檢測技術及實習，影像處理與人工智慧技術運用，智慧型量測系統及應用，系統整合之相關技術，產業相關技術應用，及結論。
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the principles and techniques required in Automatic Optical Inspection (AOI). The subject includes the following subtopics: introduction to precision metrology and machine vision, the measurement principles and methods used in the 2D AOI, the measurement principles and techniques used in the 3D AOI, image processing and artificial intelligence methods used in automatic inspection, intelligent measurement systems, AOI system integration and conclusion.

description.zh: 微加工程序含MUMPS，打樣、沉積、蝕刻；設計工具含MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 等；應用例含壓力感測器、加速度計、探針卡、微波元件、生物晶片等；最後介紹封裝與測試技術。
description.en: 1. Introductions of Microsystem 2. Micromachining Processes include MUMPS, Pattern, Deposition, Etching 3. Design Tool include MEMCAD, Matlab, EM software, and Ansys 4.Applications include Pressure sensor, Accelerometer, …,etc, -probe card and other, RFMEMS, BioMEMS 5.Packaging and testing.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹有限元素分析法基本原理及其在各種工程問題上之應用。1. 有限元素分析法之基本觀念2. 利用變分原理建立有限元素模式3. 形狀函數及等參數元素4. 一維問題:桿、桁架、樑及骨架等5. 二維問題:平面應力應變及板殼問題。6. 三維問題:一般實體7. 有限元素分析之計算機程式處理8. 有限元素分析於動態問題之應用9. 相關有限元素分析套裝軟體簡介
description.en: To introduce the basic principle of the finite element analysis and its application in solving various types of engineering problems.1. Introduction to the basic concepts of the finite element analysis2. Formulation of the finite models through the use of variational principles3. Shape functions and isoparametric elements4. One dimensional problems: rod, truss, beam, frame, etc.5. Two dimensional problems: plane stress, plane strain and plate, etc.6. Three dimensional problems: typical solids7. Implementation of the FEM computation by computer8. Finite element applications in dynamic problems9. Survey of some finite-element software systems

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。機構的類型合成與數目合成。創造性機構合成。運動、路徑和函數產生器之尺寸合成。最佳化設計。球面機構及空間機構之介紹。
description.en: Type Synthesis and Number Synthesis of Mechanisms. Creative Mechanism Synthesis.  Dimensional Synthesis of Motion, Path, and Function Generators.  Optimal Design. Introduction of Spherical Mechanisms and Spatial Mechanisms.

notes: 機電乙組 8選2(機電所與製科所合開)

description.zh: 奈微米工程於生物醫學之應用日趨重要，量測與操作工具的開發與實際的生醫應用對象的大小尺寸具有密切的相關性，對於生物系統的充份瞭解是工程表現的重要過程之一。在此課程中將配合本校實驗室目前之相關研究設備進行原理講解與應用討論，包括之項目將由分子、細胞到組織之感測、分析與操縱。選修學生須依下列重點：奈微米生醫感測系統、奈米生醫材料、奈米生醫光電以及實驗室晶片等領域選擇期中期末報告之題目與計畫內容，主要要求在尋求創新思考方向，以求在原理或應用上的突破，積極推動跨領域與技術先進之整合性研究。
description.en: Nano/micro engineering in bio-medicine applications has become increasingly important. The development and operation of measurement tool for biomedical applications has a close correlation to the actual size of the object. In this course we will explain the principles of devices and discuss the applications based on the school's research laboratories, including sensing, analysis and manipulation of molecules, cells, and tissues. Students will be required to do a project about Nano-micron biomedical sensor systems, nano-biomaterials and nano-biomedical areas such as optical and lab-chip. The interim and final report should devote to the topic and plans in the search for the direction of Creative Thinking with a view to the breakthrough of theory or application, and actively promote the integration of advanced interdisciplinary research and technology.

description.zh: 本課程介紹電子顯微鏡之結構，成像及繞射原理，以及在材料科學方面之應用，課程內容包括穿透式電子顯微鏡之構造，電磁透鏡與成像原理，電子繞射原理，繞射圖型分析，試片之製作方法。掃描式電子顯微鏡之構造及成像原理。EDS及WDS之X光光譜測量。
description.en: The course introduces the structure of a electron microscope, the theories of image forming and diffraction, the applications of materials science.  The course contents include structure of the transmission electron microscope, the electromagnetic lens and theory of image formation, theory of electronic diffraction, analysis of diffraction pattern, and the preparation of test sample.  The structure and principle of forming image for a scanning electron microscope, the X-ray spectrography of EDS and WDS are also included in this course.

notes: 製科所10選3 (機電所與製科所合開)

description.zh: 控制理論及應用簡介、線性空間及線性運算子、線性動態方程式及反應、可控制性可觀測性及穩定性、狀態回授及狀態預估、多變數I/O控制器設計及應用。
description.en: Introduction, Linear spaces and linear operators, linear dynamic equations, controllability, observability, stability analysis, state feedback and state prediction, multi-input multi-output systems, controller design and application.

description.zh: 機械振動、非線性振動、振動量測、振動抑制及隔離技術、振動與波之傳播、聲音之反射及折射、噪音之降低及吸音材料、消音器與噪音控制、法規及環境等。
description.en: Topics include: Mechanical vibration, Vibration  transmission, Vibration measurement, The use of vibration isolators and absorbers, Fundamentals of acoustics, Noise control engineering, Instrumentation and Law.

description.zh: 本課程介紹用以發展與分析三維空間多體運動學與動力學的觀念, 定義, 與技巧. 主要課題包括計算動力學簡介, 剛體運動學, 動態方程的構成, 侷限動力學與空間動力學等.
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, definitions, and techniques used for developing and analyzing kinematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics. ematics and dynamics of multibody in three dimensions. The main topics include introduction of computational dynamics, kinematics of rigid bodies, forms of the dynamic equations, constrained dynamics and spatial dynamics.

notes: 綜科327 限24人 限機電學院

description.zh: 1. 簡介2. 數學基礎	- 機率	- 隨機程序：自相關函數與功率密度函數，高斯程序、白雜訊	- 正交開展與線性濾波	- 取樣與量化3. 最佳接收器設計	- 信號的幾何表示	- 最大事後機率與最大可能接收原理	- 相配濾波器	- 錯誤機率4. 數位調變與多工技術	- 數位調變：振幅移鍵調變、相位移鍵調變、四相振幅調變、頻率移鍵調變	- 數位調變的取捨條件：錯誤機率、功率、頻寬與複雜度	- 多工技術：分頻多工、分時多工、分碼多工5. 消息理論簡介	- 源編碼與熵	- 通道編碼與通訊容量
description.en: 1. Introduction2. Mathematical Preliminaries- Probability- Random processes: autocorrelation function and power spectral density, Gaussian processes, white noise- Orthonormal expansions and linear filtering	- Sampling and quantization3. Optimal Receiver Design	- Geometric interpretation of signals	- MAP and ML receiver principles	- Matched filters	- Probability of error 4. Digital Modulation and Multiplexing- Digital modulation: ASK, PSK, QAM, FSK- Digital modulation tradeoffs: error probability, power, bandwidth and complexity- Multiplexing: FDMA, TDMA and CDMA5. Introduction to Information Theory	- Source coding and entropy	- Channel coding and capacity

name.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the character

description.zh: 本課程將介紹現今用各種結構系統〔耐震、免震（隔震）、制震（減震）〕的特性及耐震性能原理，由基礎力學理論配合應用實務設計做一統括整理解說。並從地震中建築物實際破壞狀況的解說到耐震診斷及耐震補強技術做一現況的解說與說明。
description.en: The earthquake-proof performance principle and the characteristic of the structural system (1.General structure 2.Base isolation structure 3.Virbration control,Damper) being used well now are introduced at this course, and lectures from the mechanics theory of the base to a aactual design. In addition, the destruction situation and the earthquake-proof diagnosis reinforcement in the building are explained due to the earquake.

description.zh: 1. 電力電子元件的規格 2.電力電子元件特性 3.元件與電路佈局4.元件特性與雜訊 5.元件特性與損失 6. 元件的選用與電路系統
description.en: 1. Device Specification 2.Device Characteristics 3. Component And Layout 4. Circuit Noise 5. Device Loss 6. Device Selection and Circuit Implementation.

description.zh: (1)資料庫系統簡介，(2)關聯式與實體關係資料模型，(3)資料表正規化，(4)結構化查詢語言，(5)交易管理與並時控制(6)分散式資料庫管理系統(7)物件導向式資料庫(8)電子商務中之資料庫(9)資料庫管理(10)網路式資料庫專題－規劃與實作。
description.en: (1)Introduction to database systems,(2)Relational and E-R database models,(3)Normalization of database tables,(4)SQL (Structure Query Language),(5)Transaction management and concurrence control,(6)Distributed database management systems,(7)Object oriented databases,(8)Databases in electronic commerce,(9)Database Administration,(10)Web-based database project-design and implementation.

description.zh: 中文概述：本課程主要目標在介紹射頻積體電路設計之基本原理，使學生具有射頻積體電路設計之能力。其課程內容包含如下：1、被動IC元件的特性               10、低雜訊放大器之設計2、MOS元件介紹                   11、混波器3、被動RLC網路                   12、射頻功率放大器  4、分散式系統                    13、回授系統       5、史密斯圖形及S參數             14、鎖相迴路      6、頻寬評估技術                  15、振盪器與合成器   7、射頻放大器之設計              16、結構8、電壓參考及偏壓                  9、雜訊分析
description.en: This course is introduced the principle of Radio Frequency IC Design such that the students have the ability of Radio Frequency IC design. The contents of this course are1、CHARACTERISITICS OF PASSIVE IC COMPONENTS2、A REVIEW OF MOS DEVICE PHYSICS3、PASSIVE RLC NETWORKS4、DISTRIBUTED SYSTEMS5、THE SMITH CHART AND S-PARAMETERS6、BANDWIDTH ESTIMATION TECHNIQUES7、HIGH-FREQUENCY AMPLIFIER DESIG8、VOLTAGE REFERENCES AND BIASING9、NOISE ANALYSIS10、LNA DESIGN11、MIXERS12、RF POWER AMPLIFIERS13、FEEDBACK SYSTEMS14、PHASE-LOCKED LOOPS15、OSCILLATORS AND SYNTHESIZERS16、ARCHITECTURES

description.zh: 本課程主要目標在研習以VLSI的觀點來設計近代數位訊號處理架構，使學生得以將數位訊號處理的架構以超大型積體電路IC方式來實現之。其課程內容包含如下：1、超大型積體電路介紹2、各式數位訊號架構介紹3、各式加減乘除法器架構4、DCT、FIR、MPEG等架構5、近代高效率數位訊號等架構6、專題研究
description.en: This course is an introduction to the design and implementation of various types of VLSI DSP structures and such that the students have the ability of DSP IC design in this course. The major topics covered in this course are:1、Introduction to modern VLSI system2、Introduction to digital signal processing system3、Architectures of adder、subtracter、multiplier、divider etc.4、Architectures of DCT、FIR and MPEG etc.5、Modern high-performance DSP architecture6、Special project

description.zh: 本課程主要係介紹資料壓縮的原理以及當前幾項重要的壓縮標準。本課程內容將涵蓋以下主題01. 霍夫曼編碼02. 算數編碼03. 純量量化與向量量化04. 線性預測與預測編碼法（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. 轉換編碼（KLT，DFT，DCT，DST以及Walsh-Hadamard轉換）06. 分頻編碼法（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. 小波編碼法（SPIHT，JPEG2000）08. 字典模式編碼法09. 跑長編碼法10. 主題探討
description.en: This course is mainly focused on the principles of data compression techniques as well as the state-of-the-art compression standards. The course content includes01. Huffman codes02. Arithmetic codes03. Scalar quantization and Vector quantization04. Linear prediction and Predictive coding（DPCM，ADPCM，JPEG-LS）05. Transform coding（KLT, DFT, DCT, DST, and WHT）06. Subband coding（G.722 Speech coding，MPEG audio coding）07. Wavelet-Based Compression（SPIHT, JPEG2000）08. Dictionary techniques09. Runlength coding10. Selected topics

Parametric Classifiers  5.Parameter estimation  6.Nonparametric density estimation  7.Nonparametric Classification and error estimation  8.Successive parameter estimation  9.Feature extraction and linear mapping for signal representation  10.Feature extraction and linear mapping for classification 11.Clustering  12.Applications

name.en: Application and design of engineering software

description.zh: 中文課程概述： 本課程將介紹如何使用工程軟體解決數值分析的相關問題。除此之外，本課程將培養同學在相關專業科目其工程軟體設計的技巧，並利用工程軟體所學之技巧解決各種工程問題。
description.en: How to solve the numerical analysis problem via engineering software will be introduced in this course. Students will be familiar with the programming engineering software in this course. Besides, students will learn how to utilize the software to solve the different engineering problems.

description.zh: 認識英文學術論文的語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討英文報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on English writings are concerned.

notes: 博士班必修，碩士生修不計畢業學分

description.zh: 本課程旨在對非工程類科出身之研究生，做有系統基礎材料科學之建立。課程包括(1)原子鍵結與配位(2)晶體[原子規律性](3)固相中之不規律性(4)相平衡(5)材料微結構(6)反應速率(7)材料破壞學(8)導電材與半導材料(9)陶瓷材料(10)聚合物及複合材料
description.en: This course is aimed at systematically introducing some important concepts of material engineering for students who were not an engineer training in their BS. The course covers (1)Atomic Bonding and Coordination (2)Crystal Structure (3)Disorder in Solid Phase (4)Phase Equilibria (5)Microstructures (6)Reaction Rate (7)Deformation and Fracture (8)Conducting and Semi-conducting Materials (9)Ceramic Materials (10)Polymer and Composites.

name.zh: 智能車輛技術與產業案例研究
name.en: Investigation of the Smart Green Vehicle Technologies and their Industrial Case Studies

description.zh: 智慧新能源(智能)車輛技術與產業案例研究課程有；技術面之科技趨勢與現況，產業面之產品與國際鏈結及競爭。技術面一，以車輛與環境智慧化如何面對新經濟挑戰為布局，情境創新、商業模式創新、到車聯網科技創新。技術面二，以新能源車輛技術發展如何面對新能源法規挑戰為布局，由純電池動力、複合動力系統、到燃料電池動力系統。此課程另一重點為公司產業海外鏈結與國際競爭之案例研析，其中有自駕車之系統與零組件公司，及新能源車輛動力之系統與零組件公司。公司產業海外鏈結與國際競爭之案例研析，包括公司產品與服務、核心競爭定位、技術內涵、市場與海外鏈結、未來科技與產品或服務布局、人才需求，藉此案例分析讓學生多了解產業發展與自我生涯規劃方向，也有機會在畢業前與產業對話，或布局產學合作與實習機會。
description.en: The class will start from the introduction of the smart green vehicle industry status, regulation, policy, smart system and green powertrain technologies, and their case studies of the Industrial oversea-connectivity including the innovation of scenario-based applications, value chain integration from the system development, key component supply to market promotion. The lectures will also to be delivered by the industrial experts from the intended case-study companies, and to cover their core competence of the products and services, technology road map, talent capacity building, and the future needs of the new talent. The dialogue of the industry and student will broaden the student views from domestic to global automotive status.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、製造科技相關技術及產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等，可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Workshop, Group discussion, Seminars, Manufacturing Technology in Modern Industries.

description.zh: 本課程提供學生們一個可以改善他們的科技英文寫作技巧的環境，內容將包括：1. 扼要複習英文句型與文法，2. 撰寫論文常發生的錯誤，3. 分享論文審稿的經驗，4. 提供淺顯實用的寫作原則，5. 同儕分享讀論文與寫作的錯誤心得。
description.en: This course provides an environment to help students improving their English skill in writing technical paper or thesis. What will be included in the class are: 1. concise review of sentence structure and grammar, 2. frequent writing mistakes of paper or report, 3. share of the experience in paper review, 4. offering simple and practical writing principles, 5. share the experience in reading and writing papers.

notes: 機電科所與製科所合開；限博士生修習

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

name.zh: 半導體元件物理含實習
name.en: Physics of Semiconductor Device with Practices

description.zh: 探討PN接面之特性，能帶結構，載子遷移，費米能階，製程技術原理等基本元件物理，及微奈米尺度之元件物理知識，及本課程相關實務內容。
description.en: Basic physics of semiconductor device, characteristics of P/N junction, energy band structure, carrier transportation, Fermi-level, process, etc. The relative physical knowledge of micro-nano device is discussed as well. Some relative practice will be included in the course.

name.en: Examination Guidelines for Patent and Utility Model (I)

description.zh: 本課程上學期將以智慧財產局頒布之「專利審查基準」為藍本，依「先程序後實體」原則先就「程序審查」部分介紹專利申請之程序，再就專利申請之「實體審查」部分依序說明專利說明書暨圖式之構成、可專利類型、產業利用性、新穎性、進步性等專利要件。
description.en: This course will be based on the "Patent Examination Guidelines" issued by the Taiwan Intellectual Property Office, and introduces the procedure for patent application according to the principle of "formality before substantive examination". Firstly, in the "formality examination" section, topics such as the constitution of a patent specification and drawings, the allowable subject matter for patents, utility, novelty, inventiveness and other patent elements, the first-to-file rule, unity of invention, and the priority of an patent application, will be sequentially discussed.

notes: 億光835,光電四與光電所、智財所合開

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 以圖像語言的架構教授分析性繪圖 (Analytical Drawing Process) 的概念與操作，以及分析性繪圖在設計速寫上的應用。課程以課堂講解與實地速寫來進行，主題包括感知與理解層面的三維觀察與紀錄、圖解、與圖像筆記。教學目標為：1.介紹分析性繪圖與徒手草寫。2.訓練以徒手草寫的過程來觀察、分析、與記錄結構、空間、與建成環境的三維特性。3.熟悉感知與理解的圖學系統與速寫表現手法，能以圖像筆記來記錄設計主題。
description.en: This course introduces the concept of analytical drawing process, and how to utilize it in design sketching.The objectives are:1.Introduce the concept of analytical drawing process and techniques of freehand sketch. 2.Develop the ability to see and analyze the three-dimensional characteristics of an observed object and encountered environment through analytical drawing process. 3.Familiar with both conceptual and perceptual form of representation, and be able to take a visual note to document an investigated subject.

notes: 日職合開/請進修部安排光華館409室/英文授課

description.zh: 課程通過一系列關於城市的文本(文學、電影、建築、或其他藝術），思考人跟城市的關係：文化產物如何呈現城市，和城市設計如何給不同思潮影響。如果都市化成了大趨勢，如果我們當下的存在處境離不開城市及對它的想象，我們就有理由研究城市和建築空間在不同歷史脈絡下如何影響人，和如何閱讀城市這充滿符號的文本。課程會介紹關於城市的著作、論述和理論，也會探討如現代性、後現代主義、全球化、殖民主義、解構等議題。如可能，課程會安排實地考察。
description.en: Through works of fiction, films, architecture and urbanscape, this course examines how the city is represented in texts and how cities have shaped thinking. We will examine both the visible features of a city (architecture, monumental buildings, preservation projects) and also what Calvino means by the 'invisible city.'  Cities represented in texts include Manchester, London, Paris, St. Petersburg, Buenos Aires, New York, Shanghai, Taipei, Hong Kong and Macau. Topics concerning modernity, postmodernism, globalization, colonization, and deconstruction will be explored. A field trip may be included if feasible.

description.zh: 1.寬頻和超寬頻通道模型 2.CDMA 3.多使用者偵測4.MIMO 5.時空傳輸技術 6.標準中其他無線傳輸技術
description.en: 1.wideband and ultrawideband channel modeling2.code-division multiple access (CDMA)3.multiuser detection4.multiple-input multiple output (MIMO)5.spatial multiplexing/space-time coding and in between6.other transmission technology in standards: OFDMA, UWB, etc.

description.zh: 專題報告專題演講 研究小組討論
description.en: Case Study.Seminar.Group meeting.

description.zh: 1. 智慧型控制系統簡介 2. 類神經網路（ANN）系統2-1 類神經網路基礎 2-2 類神經網路應用及實習 3. 模糊邏輯控制系統 3-1 模糊邏輯基礎 3-2 模糊控制應用及實習 4. 基因演算法 4-1 基因演算法基礎 4-2 基因演算法在控制器調制之應用及實習
description.en: English Description: 1. Introduction of artificial intelligence control system 2. Artificial neural networks (ANN) 2-1 ANN fundamentals 2-2 Applications and experiments of neural-control 3. Fuzzy logic control system  3-1 Fuzzy logic basics 3-2 Applications and experiments of fuzzy control 4. Genetic algorithms 4-1 Preliminary of GA  4-2 Tuning of Controllers using genetic algorithms.

name.zh: 經營模式與智慧化企業

description.zh: 由於產業環境辦化及科技創新速度，影響企業之營運模式。本課程旨在針對因應產業/工業4.0調整，課中會針對企業經營模式變革與產業/工業4.0產業生態鏈變革探討。 除了理論解析外，本課程並輔以企業實務個案研討。
description.en: Due to the change of industry environment and the speed of technological innovation, the business models of enterprise are impacted. The purpose of this course will study the transform of business model and the impact of Industry 4.0 on the ecosystem of industry. In the course, besides the theory will be included, the business practices case will be also covered.

description.zh: 專題討論照明與視覺心理等課題，期能對於照明相關知識能有深刻了解，並能藉課堂的研討與文獻閱讀等方法提出見解。課程內容包括永續發展之綠色照明、照明與色彩、眩光之評價、光源之新發展、燈具之美、高齡者之照明環境、防災照明、視覺與輝度分布、照明耗能評估指標與基準、晝光利用、照明之控制、道路照明與安全、戶外照明與都市環境、光污染等。
description.en: The topic is discussed with lighting and visual psychology that expect to understand some knowledge about lighting, by the method of discussion and technical literature reading to provide an opinion about lighting. The course are including green lighting for sustainable development, lighting and color, the evaluation of glare, the new tendency of lighting source, the beauty of luminair, lighting for venerable age, lighting for fire control, visual and luminance distribution, evaluation index and base of lighting energy, the advantage of daylight, lighting control, road lighting and safety, outdoor lighting and urban environment, lighting pollution.

description.zh: 本課程引入生活性的學習方法來誘發學生學習動機，並培養可在社會與職場運用的四項英文基本技能。課程目標在幫助學生在生活實境習得英文，為他們裝備可溝通表達於日常、社交活動，並提升職涯的整合性英文技能。每堂課程都注重在以學生為中心的學習活動中帶入全真、應用性高的英文技巧。課程設計涵蓋的功能包括課堂分享與作業、日常互動英文以及專業英文練習。主要課題包括溝通，簡報與談判技巧，應用閱讀與寫作，聽力技巧運用，語言與文化。
description.en: This course introduces real-world based learning approaches for students to raise their learning aspirations and to develop four essential English skills that are applicable in social and professional encounters. This course aims to help students practice English in most real-life settings and to equip them with integrated skills to advance their careers. Every class session focuses on bringing authentic and applied English in student-centered leaning activities. The class design covers the functions like information sharing and task-based activities, social interactions, and professional English practices. Essential topics include communication, techniques of negotiation and presentation, applied reading and writing, strategies for developing listening skills and language learning across cultures.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意本課程介紹各種光學方法，用以量測位移及角度之變化，光學訊號是透過光電感測器轉換為電子訊號，以便進行分析。其內容含 :            ．簡介                ．雙頻干涉儀        ．幾何誤差            ．光學尺        ．幾何光學法          ．雷射光學尺        ．干涉儀
description.en: This course introduces the optical methods used to determine the displacements and angular rotations of a target . Optical signals are transferred into electronic signals for analysis. It involves :               ．Introduction            ．Optical Heterodyne Interfeometer        ．Geometrical Error       ．Optical Encoder         ．Geometrical  Methods   ．Laser Encoder        ．Interferometers

description.zh: 本課程之目標為依人力職能需求，參考國內外之先行經驗，整合智能化生產所需之知識與技能訓練，以淬鍊出一套務實之智能化生產課程。本課程將涵蓋工業4.0-智能化生產所需相關基礎技術之教學與實作課程，包括物聯網基礎技術與應用實例、雲端服務系統與資訊安全技術、巨量資料管理、分析、及應用實例、智慧化企業與工廠管理系統與應用、自動化與機器人技術及應用等等。
description.en: The goal of this course is to meet the needs of the manpower function, with reference to the previous experiences from domestic and abroad groups. This course will cover the topics related to the basic technology required for intelligent production, including the basic technology and application examples of the Internet of Things, the cloud service system and information security technology, the huge amount of data management, Intelligent enterprise and factory management systems and applications, automation and robot technology and applications, and so on.

description.zh: 本課程旨在讓學生學習如何做財務投資決策，使得商業或工業的投資專案得到最大投資效益或最經濟的成本，課程主題包含：投資環境的定義、投資專案評估方法、利率及通膨率、資產折舊、所得稅、專案現金流量分析、專案投資風險與不確定性、實質選擇權、商業及工業投資案例研討。本課程中將考量專案投資分析的各種影響因素，使得決策者可以更有效地做出投資決策。
description.en: The objective of this course is to teach students how to make smart financial decisions in an effort to create economical products. The subjects includes: the investment environment, investment project evaluation, interest rate and inflation rate, depreciation, income taxes, developing project cash flows, uncertainty and risk, real options, special topics of business and engineering decision. Various factors that affect the investment project decision problems are discussed to help decision maker properly resolves investment decision.

description.zh: 智慧型製造系統、2.MES 系統、3.通訊介面標準與設計、4.遠端監控、5.智慧型偵測與診斷、6.容錯系統、7.介面整合
description.en: 1.Introduction on intelligent manufacturing system 2.MES system 3.Standard and design for communication interfaces 4.Remote monitoring 5.Intelligent monitoring and diagnostics 6.Faults tolerant system 7.Integration for interfaces

name.zh: 數位化設計與開發特論
name.en: Special Topics on e-Design and e-Development

description.zh: 如何藉由商務模型的分析，建置數位化協同產品設計與開發環境，並說明資料管理、構型管隨著網路時代的來臨，不但造成數位化協同產品設計與開發觀念的興起，也造成數位化協同平台技術逐漸成熟，並且將同步工程觀念的實現更往前邁進一大步。本課程是從數位化協同產品設計與開發概念之介紹開始，使學生明白數位化協同產品設計與開發在現代製造業中的重要性，接著介紹理與工作流程管理等相關實務應用觀念。
description.en: Information and network technologies have promoted the traditional concurrent engineering to the next generation. The collaborative e-design and e-development concept has been more popular in industries. This course is introduced from the concept of collaborative product design and development to help students understanding the importance of collaborative e-design and e-development in modern industries. Furthermore, the business model analysis method is provided to construct the collaborative environment of e-design and e-development. In addition, some real cases of data management, configuration management, and workflow management are mentioned.

description.zh: 本課程說明知識的定義、知識的分類、產業知識的產生和移轉，進而探討知識的創新，並利用知識管理提升產業生產及營運的效率，產業應用知識管理的概況和案例
description.en: This course is to explain definition of the knowledge, classification of the knowledge and generation and transfer of the knowledge. Moreover, the innovation of the knowledge will be discussed. Using knowledge management, it will improve the efficiency of the production and operation of the business. The applications and examples of the knowledge management will be included.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意介紹雷射加工之理論及實務，注重製程參數之研究，教導學生如何掌握製程，以達到精密製造的要求。內容包括雷射輔助製造程序、雷射加工設備、雷射加工原理、系統分析、實驗設計、雷射加工實例。
description.en: Introducing theory and practice of laser material processing. Emphasizing the study of manufacturing factors. Letting the students know how to control manufacturing process, and fulfill the demand of precision manufacturing. The course content is : laser assisted manufacturing processes, facilities for laser material processing, the principles of laser material processing, system analysis, examples of laser material processing.

description.zh: 產品設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved product design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

description.zh: 科技始終來自於人性，不論是家具、室內或產品設計目的都是服務人群，因而應該以人為中心來考量生活形態、人因、心理認知、文化等層面對設計的影響。本課程旨在闡明此一理念，課程包括：以使用者為中心的設計方法及步驟，並輔以實例說明及個案研討。
description.en: "Technology always comes from humanity."  The purpose of interior, furniture or product is to serve people.  Therefore, their design should reflect the user's life style, human factors, mental cognitions and cultural differences.  This course aims to explore human-centered design.  First, the definition and significance of human-centered design will be discussed.  The methods and procedures of human-centered design in the field of design will also be studied.  Finally, some examples and case studies will be explored.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

notes: 共同103A 博碩課程, 日夜合開

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間)運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

name.zh: 進階整合設計研究與實務專題(三)
name.en: Advanced integrated design research and practice project(III)

description.zh: 藉由國內外設計競賽主題與產學合作設計案進行實際演練，著重於資料蒐集、商品分析、創新構想與成果表達之進階能力養成，期讓學生在國內外設計競賽舞台上展現光芒，在產學合作中習得實務經驗並獲致產業界肯定。因此本課程旨在以實際演練達成兼具創新性與商品化專業設計能力養成。
description.en: Advanced Integrated Design educates students to identify and resolve design problems - innovatively and with sensitivity to the social, physical and ecological environment. Students learn to analyze and solve diverse design problems from technical, aesthetic, social and ecological viewpoints. Students are given the resources to identify, expand and test personal and professional development through an intensive exploration of design ideas. Innovation is stressed, along with the ability to refine formal design issues. There are numerous opportunities for students to work with industry through corporate-sponsored studio projects and design competitions.

description.zh: 本課程透過專題討論方式，針對學生之設計研究主題進行研討，透過實務相關議題之深入解析，培養學生之研究方法及論述的能力，建立自己的研究架構，經由(一)至(四)個階段之訓練，使研究議題能由淺入深，完成其各階段性之設計研究專題。
description.en: This course is focus on the discussion of students’ deign topics in seminar form. Through the in-depth analysis of practices related issues to train students’ research methods and discuss ability; and construct their own research frameworks. Furthermore, students could complete each design projects of different stages through four stages training.

description.zh: 自由度、(平面與空間)運動幾何分析、彈簧、避震器、力傳遞分析、撓性、電腦輔助懸吊系統分析與設計。
description.en: Degree of Freedom, (2D and 3D) Kinematic Analysis, Springs, Dampers, Force Analysis, Compliance, Computer Aided Analysis and Design of Suspension Systems.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 本課程旨在協助學生探究教育社會學的理論與實務，探討主題包含:社會化、社會階層、教育機會均等、技職教育與社會發展等，並期學生運用相關論點對當前技職教育問題提出建議。
description.en: This course is designed to assist students understanding the theory and practice of the sociology of education and applying sociological views to solve the problems. Topics include socialization and education, social change transition and education, equity of educational opportunity, collaboration between social development and technical-vocational education, etc.

notes: 博碩課程, 日夜合開, 共同411室

name.zh: 創業講座-創業家的思考與行動
name.en: Entrepreneurship Lectures- Entrepreneurs' thinking and action

description.zh: 隨著互聯網的發展與產值快速成長，網路創業大行其道，成為許多創業者的新選擇，本課程邀請國內知名創業楷模或創業成功典範之企業經理人分享創業成功之經驗。以真實具體的創業經驗為教材，讓學生更深刻體驗創業家之精神。希冀以觀摩學習典範企業的具體經驗，帶領學生學習企業創新與創業的思維，進而激發學生追求成就的渴望，強化青年學子對人生願景的規劃。
description.en: Along with the prosperous development of Internet, the output value of E-commerce is growing fast. Launching a business on the internet has become a new choice for many entrepreneurs. We invite the domestic business manager, as the model of outstanding and successful enterprise, to share his experiences of achievement with students. By offering the real and specific examples, business manager will make students learn further about the enterprisers' entrepreneurship. Through their experiences, we hope students can learn innovations and creations of enterprise; furthermore, students can be inspired to pursue their ambition to strengthen their wills to plan the future.

notes: 經管所與最後一哩合開；9/13-11/1

name.en: Enterprise Process Practice and ERP Application

description.zh: 採混成教學，透過面授了解企業，從產業、行業到組織，及資訊系統應用實務。藉由數位課程學習企業內各職能作業流程及ERP系統功能。配合上機實作及老師案例引導，強化系統運用與企業流程整合。
description.en: By mixed teaching methods, help students to learn enterprises from their industries, organizations and information system applications; Use digital learning courses to introduce tasks of roles in business and ERP system functions. Besides, online practices will be provided. With case studies guided by our instructors, students might learn how to integrate the system with actual enterprise operating procedures.

notes: 經管所與最後一哩合開

description.zh: 本堂課邀請元大寶來期貨、證券及財富管理各領域投資達人，從總經訊息剖析、產業趨勢分析、財報分析選股、期權商品策略介紹及交易實戰技巧，為台北科技大學學生分享其業界多年的寶貴心得。財富自由是每個人所企求的，如何於在學期間培養好的投資理財觀念及交易技巧，一方面可降低未來步入職涯後財富大幅縮水的風險，另一方面或許可成為步入職場的利器，甚至可能是邁向財富自由的另一助力。
description.en: This class is going to invite investment experts from Yuanta Futures and Yuanta Securities to teach the students by sharing their practical experience in the finance industry. The contents include macroeconomic information analysis, industry trend analysis, financial statements analysis, investment strategies of futures and warrants, as well as experience sharing of trading techniques. Everybody wants to achieve financial independence; therefore it is important to have the right concept of investments and trading techniques. The purpose of this course is, on the one hand, help students reduce the risk of financial loss due to lack of financial knowledge. On the other hand, for those students who are interested in financial industry, this course offers practical training and may help students to find good financial-related jobs in the future. Also, it may help students to achieve the goal of financial independence.

notes: 經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 國際貿易與關務解析(一)
name.en: Application of international trade and Customs declaration Resolution (I)

description.zh: 目的：協助同學通過我國「關務特考」、「報關專責人員特考」、「國際貿易大會考認證考試」等國家考試中「國際貿易」之相關考科。內容：解析國內國家考試「關務實務」之命題趨勢。並以實際國際貿易中實務操作為案例，在解題過程中引導學生建立完整的關貿概念，增進學生對貿易實務與關務理論的理解與應用能力，培養學生的邏輯思考、並增進解題技巧，順利通過國家考試。
description.en: Purpose: To assist students to pass the relevant examinations of "International Trade", such as " National Special Examination for Customs Specialized personnel", " National Special Examination for Customs Officers", "International Trade Examination for IEAT" and other national examinations.Content: By introducing the practical applications to the students, which guiding students to get a full understanding of International Trade Practice System while solving the problems by using real cases. It reinforces students’ knowledge and understanding on the International Trade, and helps students to think logically and also increases their problem-solving skills that help students to pass the national examinations successfully.

notes: 經管所與最後一哩合開

name.zh: 創新講座-創意與創新思維(一)

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

notes: 工設四、創新所與最後一哩合開；9/14-10/26

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(一)

description.zh: 本課程提供學生養成基本日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life.In addition , using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語1(A1上)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

name.zh: 國際觀培養:基礎西班牙語2(A1下)

description.zh: 本課程專為初學西班牙文之學生設計，毋需任何西班牙文基礎。本課程著重在學習西班牙文發音及了解基礎文法架構。課程結束前，學生將可以閱讀基本的西班牙文文句、自我介紹及西班牙文的基礎對話。
description.en: This is course is designed for first time students of Spanish. No previous knowledge is required to enroll this course. The focus of this course is to provide a basic knowledge of the pronunciation and grammatical structures of Spanish at the beginner level. By the end of this course, the student will be able to read basic texts in Spanish, self-introduce himself and start a basic conversation.

notes: 優先開放修畢基礎西班牙語1；9/27開始上課

name.zh: 國際觀培養:日語與文化(二)
name.en: Development of global perspective: Japanese Ⅱ

description.zh: 本課程為日語與文化(一)之進階課程，提供學生養成進階日語聽說讀寫技能，並能夠面對在各種情境下，表達出適當的日語，足以應付日常生活簡單狀況。此外，並運用多媒體等工具，介紹日本文化，歷史，人文等多種面向，讓學生能更多元地了解日本，有效提升學習興趣及效率。
description.en: This course is designed for students who has basic Japanese knowledge or who passed the language course: Japanese (I) in the previous term. This course provides a comprehensive approach to developing the four basic language skills (listening, speaking, reading, and writing) in order to cultivate your overall Japanese language ability to a level sufficient for various occasions and everyday life. In addition, using multimedia to introduce a variety of Japanese culture, history , and humanities. The students can learn more about Japan in many different perspectives, and effectively enhance interest in the learning process.

notes: 開放修畢日語(一)者或有基礎者

name.zh: 國際觀培養:展望東協新契機
name.en: Feast for the global perspective - Outlook for the Opportunities in Southeast Asian Countries

description.zh: 本課程藉由邀請校內外之社會、政治、經濟、文化等專家學者與莘莘學子們進行相互交流，透過「全球議題」、「文化學習」等主題之進階探討，培養學生世界公民之意識，提升學生跨文化溝通能力、適應全球化生活與國際競爭力。
description.en: We invite the domestic speakers, as the outstanding scholars of cross-cultural communication, to share their knowledge and experiences with students. By exploring the global issues such as social, cultural, political or economic studies, the course makes students learn further about the world, and inspires students to strengthen their independent thinking and global perspective.

description.zh: 藉由課程的基礎介紹，另邀請綠色能源各領域之專家，包含政府行政機關、財團法人研究智庫、非營利組織以及重點產業專家，輔以專題演講與對談的方式，強化同學對綠能科技、政策、市場與產業發展的認識，深化其跨領域學術整合的能量，形塑對前瞻能源之國際佈局能力，並規劃同學分組上臺報告的能力，加深其對綠色能源的認知。
description.en: Due to the shortage of gasoline and serious pollutions, the development of the green energy is the most important issue for the whole world. This course will introduce the solar cells, water splitting systems, and other green energies. The main goal is to help students understand the development and direction of the green energies in the world, and further inspire their motivation to join the related industries. This course will also train students the ability to search and report, and further to learn more about the green energies.

description.zh: 介紹有效領導行為、參與式領導、授權、雙向角色形成理論、權力影響力、管理特質和管理技能、魅力領導和轉型領導、有效領導之權變理論、領導組織變革、團隊領導和決策群體、總裁的策略領導。透過該門課程的內涵及教學策略進行通識專業選修的改革創新，以培養學生能夠具備清晰流暢的溝通表達能力。
如英文概述內容所述
description.en: This course is intended to help students explore various issues concerning intellectual property protection for industrial designs. The topics cover design patents, trademark, copyright, indigenous cultural expressions, and design service contracts. Students are required to read articles and cases prior to each class. Participation is necessary. The grading is based on the final term paper, in-class presentation, and participation.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹並討論衡量系統可靠度常用的機率模式、串連系統、並連系統及混合式系統的可靠度特性及其評估方式。此外也介紹評估實際系統時常用的統計方法及資料蒐集和推論的技巧，最後討論可修護系統的可靠度衡量。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to discuss how to construct the structure fuhction of a system and to culculate its reliability.some probability models and probability distributions that are commonly used for lifetime representations will be introduced.series system,parallel system,and the conlination of both will be thorouqhly diseerssed in respect of their reliability characteristics. The statistical mefthods related to data colleetion and inference that are useful when evaluating the reliability of real-life systems will also be mentioned. Finally,we will introduce the concept of repairabie systems and related probability models.

name.zh: 使用者經驗資料收集與分析
name.en: User Experience Data Collection and Analysis

description.zh: 產品與服務的開發與設計主要在提升使用者的經驗。以此課程教授使用者經驗的概念與其資料收集與分析的方法。學生將能了解使用者經驗的概念、其資料的收集的方法與資料形式，以及相關之實驗設計與統計分析的方法。
description.en: The primary objective of the development and design of products and services is to enhance user experience. The concept of user experience and the methods for its data collection and analysis will be taught in the course. Students will learn the user experience concept, the methods of data collection and the formats of collected data, as well as related methods of experimental design and statistical analysis.

name.zh: 心理物理學與信號偵測理論

description.zh: 此課程旨在使學生了解如何以科學方法研究物理刺激與認知感官之間的關係，並採用信號偵測理論，進而考量人因工程於產品、系統設計之應用。
description.en: The goal of the course is to empower students in learning the scientific approach of psychophysics, the relation between physical stimuli and human sensations and perceptions, applying the method of signal detection theory. Further applications applying human factors and ergonomics in product development and system design are considered.

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 本課程著重在奈米材料的合成以及鑑定，包含氣相反應以及溶液相反應。課程核心內容為：(1)各式溶液相合成奈米粉末、中空奈米球以及奈米線(2)氣相反應合成奈米管、奈米線(3)分子轉印技術(4)奈米材料檢測技術
description.en: This course will cover the syntheses and characterization of various nanomaterials. The core lectures include:1. syntheses of nanoparticles, hollow nanospheres and nanowires from solutions2. syntheses of nanowires and nanotubes from the gas phase3. molecular imprinting4. characterization and properties of nanomaterials

description.zh: 本課程係將個別半導體製造程序視為獨立單元，運用化工單元操作的概念，併同現有半導體產業與未來發展趨勢的分析介紹，再輔以積體電路元件的設計原理，期使具化工背景人員能從製程、設備、元件原理等各方面取得一對半導體製程的整合性觀念。課程內容：(1)產業概覽(2)積體電路基本技術背景(3)積體電路設計(4)積體電路製造(5)內連線RC延遲電路與放大電路(6)金屬化製程技術(7)平坦化製程技術(8)物理氣相沉積與化學氣相沉積技術(9)線層/阻障層/種晶層(10)金屬填充/金屬互連(0.5~0.18um)(11)銅製程整合(0.13um含以上)(12)基極/位元線路/電容器(13)積體電路製程相關設備
description.en: In this class, the specified semiconductor process is considered as specified unit. By use of the concepts which belong to the chemical engineering unit operations to interpret the analysis / introduction in semiconductor industry and future developing trending. (Also including the theories of VLSI devices) The students who have studied professional chemical engineering courses for many years, can acquire completed and integrated viewpoints in semiconductor process. (Including processes; apparatuses and theories of devices)1. Industry overview2. IC Fundamentals3. IC Design4. IC Fabrication5. Interconnect RC Delay  vs Scaling6. Metallization technology 7. Planarization technology8. PVD and CVD Technology 9. Liner/Barrier/Seed (0.5-0.18um)10. Metal Fill/ Metal Interconnect (0.5-0.18um)11. Cu Integration (0.13um and beyond)12. Gate/Bit Line/Capacitor13. IC Equipments

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 本課程主要闡述企業經營管理者於財務金融管理中最重要的財務金融基本架構與財務決策，結合資訊工具、財務軟體、財金資料庫及財金資訊網站的應用，並配合各項相關議題進行個案研討，以深入淺出方式介紹財金管理之基本觀念與理論架構，以結合財金管理實務並融入財務決策研討，培育理論與實務兼備之財金管理人才。本課程涵蓋企業在資金管理與財務規劃預測之相關議題，如：金融市場的功能與運作，金融工具的運用、金融資產的定價模式、實體資產評價與投資專案分析、資本結構分析以及風險管理等。透過本課程之學習，期許學生能具備財金管理領域之學科知識與專業技術整合能力、判斷性思考能力與決策能力，以及制訂並解決財金管理問題之能力。
description.en: This course is designed to introduce students to the theoretical and practical aspects of financial management and financial decisions by using case study, information tools, quantitative technique, financial software, and financial database. Several important concepts will be studied in detail, including: the operation and roles of financial markets, applications of financial instruments, financial asset pricing, capital budgeting decision, capital structure decision, and risk management. The course involves studies on decision-making utilizing financial resources available to the firm from the perspective of the manager. The basic financial concepts that will help students solve problems and exercises designed to financial strategies and corporate policies.

name.zh: 數位行銷與產品創新管理

description.zh: 隨著網際網路的盛行，電子商務迅速地蓬勃發展，經營網路行銷/數位行銷的需求，已經是每個公司所必需的。從新產品的開發、行銷、到售後服務均受影響。網路電子商務已經成為傳統行銷通路以外的一個新興通路。再加上網路全年無休、成本低廉、以全球為市場的優勢，以及可符合消費者的需求的特色，使得電子商務明顯的成為未來商業發展的主流。因此，如何經營數位行銷已是現代企業具有競爭力重要課題。  在數位行銷的潮流下，產品差異化和產品研發創新管理更是格外的重要。此課程主要內容包含了如何操作數位行銷，和產品研發創新管理。主要對象為有興趣從事數位行銷和企業產品研發創新發明機會或技能的學生們。此課程不僅介紹數位行銷和產品研發創新發明工具而且提供課程上實際演練。產品創新管理主要內容包含如何辨識企業產品研發創新機會與問題；發現新點子；發展最適解答；展示創新成果與萃思方法介紹。課程上也會提出許多相關企業的應用實例討論。 其目的在於幫助學生們學習了解創新工具與系統創新方法在產品研發創新管理的專業領域及利用課程上的產品研發創新工具。
description.en: E-marketing is the conducting of business on the internet, not only buying and selling but also servicing customers and collaborating with business partners. This course will introduce the e-marketing by the way of concept, theory and case study. This course will study how to develop the business on the internet. Production innovation is very important in e-marketing. Production R&D Innovation Management course focuses on the particular interest to those students who are considering Production R&D development of an innovative business opportunity or innovation management skills. This part of course not only discusses the basics toolkits for every innovator needs, but also provides the practice workshop of systematic innovation. Major topics include how to identifying the opportunity and problem of Production R&D; discover the new ideas; develop the solution; demonstrate the innovation; and the TRIZ works. Many of the examples will also be discussed in their entrepreneurial approaches

description.zh: 以消費者為重心已蔚為目前市場行銷的重要潮流。了解消費者決策過程也成為行銷領域研究的主流。一般而言，消費者的購買決策制定過程決定產品與服務的購買結果，主要包括五個階段：(1)問題察覺、(2)資訊搜尋、(3)方案評估、(4)購買選擇、(5)購後過程。消費者的購買決策制定過程深受各種不同因素之影響。這些因素大抵可分為兩個類別：個人內在因素（知覺、資訊處理與學習、記憶、知識、動機與涉入、價值觀、自我與人格、生活形態、態度、與情感等）與環境因素（行銷環境、購買情境、文化、團體與人際影響、家庭等）。本課程主要目標在使學生了解消費者決策過程與相關心理學、社會學、行銷學與廣告學原理之間的關係。課程以哈佛式個案討論為主。
description.en: The course teaches the student marketing concepts and trends. The topics will be covered: (1) consumer behavior, (2) marketing segmentation, (3) product strategy, (4) marketing channels, (5) online marketing, (6) relationship marketing.

description.zh: 隨著雲端運算服務的廣為使用及網際網路服務的發展，我們已經處於大數據時代，如何處理與儲存大數據、如何從大數據中，探勘有用的知識，成為近年來熱門的研究議題。本課程內容尚包括如何處理與分析大數據、如何更進一步從大數據分析發展市場行銷與顧客關係管理策略，大數據各種案例實務探討等。
description.en: With the development of cloud computing services and Internet services, it has generated a very huge amount of data. How to handle and store these big data and how to mine useful knowledge from big data have become the popular research topics. The contents of this course also include how to handle and store big data, and how to develop marketing and customer relationship management strategies thru big data analysis, and various big data practices and case studies.

description.zh: 針對學生之學習研究心得報告，集體討論，以訓練學生研究之能力。
description.en: This course provides the students opportunity to discuss after reading the management related journals. The goal is to improve students' research capabilities.

notes: 管理博與工管碩博合開

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: The object of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students. This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles. Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

notes: 博班；管理博與工管博合開

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹英語全球化、全球英語，以及英語作為國際語言的發展與相關論述，並針對英語在全球擴散的現象，檢視相關的概念與理論。本課程將探討因英語全球化所造成，在社會語言學、文化、政治經濟與教育等方面的重要議題，以及與全球英語相關的議題與爭論。
description.en: This course aims to provide students with an overview of the spread of the English language around the world, the emergence of English varieties, and the development of the popularization of English as a lingua franca. It examines the various concepts and theories developed in academia to account for the unprecedented global expansion of English. Through readings and class discussion, this course will look at key sociolinguistic, cultural, politico-economic and educational issues arising from the spread of English as well as the current issues and debates surrounding Global Englishes. Students will be encouraged to conduct original research on or detailed analysis of the implications of English as the international language.

description.zh: 讀書報告、專題討論、機電系統產品介紹與討論、Seminar心得等。可重覆修習。
description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 數位革命時代的來臨，CAD/CAE/CAM/PDM也是資訊科技的產物，相關技術的整合與應用已普遍實踐於產品開發，藉由資訊科技建立「資料一元化」的數位設計環境，打破傳統產品開發的溝通障礙與隔閡，整合跨機能的設計團隊，達成「同步工程」的理想，才能因應全球產業快速的變革。電腦輔助技術不僅是新的設計工具，其更深層的意義是產品開發體系的整體運作與管理方式也受到此一新技術影響，需有合理合適的管理架構與設計程序配合，才能有效運用，創造出其應有的價值。本課程將先探討資訊科技的原理與發展趨勢，以及分析產品設計模式與設計活動的特質，進而瞭解資訊科技對產品開發的衝擊與影響；然後以實際案例透過數位化設計技術，有效縮短產品開發時程，實現同步工程的理想。
description.en: Information technology, which brings many changes to the commercial and industrial activities, makes the digital revolution happen in the recent era. In the field of product development, information technology through computer-aided design has been very influential as well, which has not only replaced traditional tools, but also altered the design procedures. The aim of this course is to study the method of product development in a concurrent engineering. In this course, the first theme is to review information technology and product development process to comprehend the impact of CAD on product development. The other theme, by the project practice, is to implement the techniques of concurrent engineering using CAD/CAM system on product development.

description.zh: 認知記號, 產品語意, 生活環境相關課題, 以科技整合, 人因互動, 研究方法為重點, 以跨領域整合, 國際合作, 模擬驗證為特色之研  究.
description.en: This course provides study of design-ergonomics related topics on Cognitive Semiotics and Product Semantics. With emphasis on technology integration, ergonomics proactive and methodology, the course will be characterized by inter-disciplinary and international cooperation and simulation verification.

notes: 電機所、自動化所與電資國際班合開

description.zh: 認識科技文章及科技學術論文語法、文體、結構組織等特質，並探討技術報告及論文撰寫方式。
description.en: This course helps the learners recognize the syntax, style, and organization as far as the papers on technology and technical writings are concerned. Discussions include specific ways to technical presentation and technical writings.

description.zh: 本課程以哈佛個案教學方法進行，在每個個案討論當中，同時由行銷管理、財務管理、科技管理、生產管理領域老師教授。可以讓學生在學管理工功能之外，還可以學習這些管理功能的整合，學期末並有分組個案競賽，促進團隊互動與學習。
description.en: The Integrated Management Case Studies would be taught by case methods from Havard Business School’s cases. Every case will be taught from Marketing, Financing, Technology Management, and Operation Management areas faculty. This course focus on the integration of management functions. The case contest will be hold on the final week to encourage team building and learning.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論
description.en: Literature Study, Seminar, Group meeting.

description.zh: 說明古蹟及歷史建築之研究價值，研究對象，探討由古蹟建築之時代、地理位置、社會文化環境內容、人為環境內容、組織建築空間與構築建築實體，及其影響因素等各層面來進行研究之過程與方法。透過國內外相關理論與實物的個案分析，現場觀摩與實習，研討台灣古蹟保存與再利用的理論，法源與技術。
description.en: This course will systematically discuss various themes of historical building, including the building's architectural characters and the influent sectors of that social cultural circumstance (ex. historic period, site, or person…) . By way of the reading and discussing about the relative theory and works, that student can understand the though and technique of the architectural preservation and reuse.

name.en: An introduction to sustainable architectural research

description.zh: 本課程主要係針對全球化與國際化時代來臨後，身為地球村的一份子如何整合因對永續建築與環境不同價值觀所帶來之衝擊，並透過客觀研究與實際案例具體提出適切的解決之道，以取得永續建築與環境所存在異同之平衡。課程期望透過引導並激發研究者在面對永續建築與環境之種種議題時，能夠同時尋求人類與建築以及環境三者間共存共榮之最適當方式。學習過程中，研究者除必需提出理論與實務案例做為研究之基礎外，傳授者同時亦將由研究討論過程中了解研究者個別之特質，並依照其不同特質協助研究者建立正確的邏輯思維，以建立建築專業道德與卓越價值觀，以期確實能夠使研究者在精確掌握時代趨勢的前提下，提出符合建築專業研究對於永續建築與環境兩者異同平衡之解決策略與妥善建議，並期望藉由研究能夠更進一步獲得社會對於建築專業研究之認同，最終達到永續建築與環境平衡之目標。

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的是介紹計算流體力學方法在工程上的應用，使學生能利用計算流力方法配合電腦的快速運算能力以解決工程上與能源、冷凍空調及熱流相關的問題。課程內容主要包括：計算流力簡介、基礎熱流方程式、紊流模式、有限差分法簡介、有限體積法簡介、套裝軟體應用以及案例分析。
description.en: The objective of this course is to introduce the engineering application of Computational Fluid Dynamics (CFD). Based upon the method of CFD and fast calculation ability of computers, students can solve related problems in the fields of energy, refrigeration and air-conditioning, and thermofluid sciences. The main content of this course includes "Introduction to CFD", "Foundation of thermofluid governing equations", "Turbulent models", "Introduction to finite difference method", "Introduction to finite volume method", "Application of package software", and "Case study".

description.zh: 最近數年應用電腦軟體來計算分子的幾何形狀與力學數據已變得相當熱門，這些軟體不但計算小分子相當快速，即使是很複雜的分子也可行。本課程探討現行染料化學所常用軟體的應用範圍、準確性與限制條件並舉數個例子來顯現其優點。
description.en: Within the last few years, computer programs have been developed which are based on force-field methods, allowing for fast calculations of the molecular geometry and dynamics of single molecules as well as more complex systems.This course is designed to provide a survey of the commonly used theoretical methods in dye chemistry,to discuss their scope and limitations, and to present some examples as illustrations of their advantages.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹最佳化方法在電子、電機、微波工程的應用，其段落安排可分為三部份。第一部份是最佳化方法的基礎知識，包含了如何將問題建立成數學模型，還有講解問題複雜度、問題分類等背景知識。第二部份是遺傳演算法（evolutionary algorithms）的理論與操作，教學內容包含了基因演算法、粒子群演算法、模擬退火法、進階基因演算法等方式，除了講解它們的流程，也會列舉它們在電子與微波領域的成效。第三部份是實驗設計與分析（design and analysis of experiments），透過統計學的「佈點」與「顯著性檢定」，使用者將能以最短之時間掌握問題的反應曲面（response surface），並進而預測出最佳設計。此課程除了能幫助同學閱讀文獻，也能協助同學增進研究品質與效率。
description.en: This course consists of three parts. The first one is about the background of optimization algorithms, such as problem formulation, problem complexity, and no free lunch theorems for optimization. The second part is evolutionary algorithms, including the simple genetic algorithm, particle swarm optimization, simulation annealing, and advanced genetic algorithms. The third part is design and analysis of experiments. By using fractional factorial designs, optimization can be done in a very efficient way.

description.zh: 介紹非傳統加工方法及加工相關的自動化與控制技術，包括：製程控制，數值控制，幾何資料處理，進給驅動器，NC機器的位置量測系統，自動化加工的機器監視與診斷，電腦整合製造。
description.en: Introduce the nontraditional manufacturing methods and related automation and control technology, including: process control, numerical control, geometric data processing, driving systems, NC machine position measurement system, automatic manufacturing monitoring and diagnostics, computer integrated manufacturing.

name.zh: 通俗文化中的莎士比亞

description.zh: 莎翁與通俗文化有什麼關係呢？莎翁的作品不是難以理解嗎？欣賞莎翁的作品不需要特別的訓練、時間、與長期的投資嗎？這些問題的答案可以同時是肯定和否定的。不論您喜歡與否，在當代的文化裡，莎翁無所不在。Paul Prescott已經指出：「莎翁的蹤影並不局限於教室、大學、劇場等正式場合，而是在電影、電視、新聞小報、電玩、流行音樂、連環漫畫、及廣告等大眾媒體上到處可見。」確實，莎翁早已是無可迴避的圖像。他的語言文字、人物、劇本情節已經在通俗的大眾媒體上受到廣泛的挪用。「通俗文化中的莎士比亞」是為了有意於為了各種目的而挪用莎翁作品內容之學生，包括以「通俗莎士比亞」作為英語文教材之中小學教師，而設計之英文課程。為了瞭解，甚至挪用莎翁作品內容的複雜性與其中蘊含之永恆不變、舉世皆然的真理，我們將透過電影、科幻故事、與肥皂劇等媒介，以異於傳統的反向方式間接研習莎翁作品的珍貴特質與內容，以瞭解社會大眾為了有效達成商業、文化、及政治的目的，是如何挪用莎翁作品。修習本課程的學生亦可推薦有助於未來透過通俗莎翁進行英語文教學之電影、科幻故事、與肥皂劇，作為上課教材。
description.en: What has Shakespeare to do with popular culture? Are his writings not difficult and more or less inaccessible? Does it not require special training, time and long-term investment to appreciate Shakespeare? Well, the answer might be yes and no. Like it or not, Shakespeare is everywhere in contemporary culture. As Paul Prescott has pointed out, “His presence is not confined to the ‘official’ locations of classrooms, universities and theatres, but permeates popular mass media such as cinema, television, tabloid journalism, computer games, pop music, comics and advertisements.” Indeed, Shakespeare has long been an inescapable icon. His words, characters, and plots have been widely appropriated to appear across a range of popular mass media.
