name.zh: 設計研究與創作專題(三)
name.en: The Research and Practice on Design Issues (III)

description.zh: 接續設計研究與創作專題(二)，本課程針對特定設計議題，導引學生應用研究與設計理論，並透過適當研究與設計方法探討其潛在的問題與有效的解決方法。議題主要針對：產品、空間、資訊、機構識別等設計行銷與服務設計、評量與管理等項目之研究與創作。課程研習結果可望作為研究生進階研究或設計創作之重要基礎。
description.en: In continuing the study of “The Research and Practice on Design Issues (II)”, the course focuses on specific design issues, and directs students to apply proper theories and methods in research and design in order to explore critical problems and to provide effective solutions. Specific issues in relation to marketing and service management regarding the design of product, space, information and corporate identity are to be researched and be practiced. The result of study forms the foundation of further research or design development for research students.

name.zh: 教育訓練需求評估與規劃

description.zh: 教育訓練是人力資源的一環，本課程探討教育訓練的種類及評估訓練需求的方法與程序，並了解人力部門在規劃員工訓練計劃之前，如何對員工進行調查以確實地掌握員工的需求及意願，同時亦能掌握企業之發展目標。
description.en: Educational training is part of the human resources. This curriculum will discuss the categories of educational training and evaluate the methods and procedures of the training needs, and understand how the human resource department investigates the employee's needs and will, and know the development aim of the enterprise as well before the planning of the employee educational training program.

name.zh: 設計研究與創作專題(三)
name.en: The Research and Practice on Design Issues (III)

description.zh: 接續設計研究與創作專題(二)，本課程針對特定設計議題，導引學生應用研究與設計理論，並透過適當研究與設計方法探討其潛在的問題與有效的解決方法。議題主要針對：產品、空間、資訊、機構識別等設計行銷與服務設計、評量與管理等項目之研究與創作。課程研習結果可望作為研究生進階研究或設計創作之重要基礎。
description.en: In continuing the study of “The Research and Practice on Design Issues (II)”, the course focuses on specific design issues, and directs students to apply proper theories and methods in research and design in order to explore critical problems and to provide effective solutions. Specific issues in relation to marketing and service management regarding the design of product, space, information and corporate identity are to be researched and be practiced. The result of study forms the foundation of further research or design development for research students.

name.zh: 金融科技應用程式介面實務講座
name.en: Practice Seminar on API  (Application Programming Interface) in Financial Technology

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在請實務界專家介紹金融科技 API(Application Programming Interface，應用程式介面)的實務應用。講座內容包括：金融科技實務(API應用)、創新服務設計、區塊鏈應用與API介紹、API架構教學、金融3.0 x 銀行實務、金融3.0 x 證券實務、金融3.0 x 產險實務、金融3.0 x 人壽實務、金融創新應用與資訊安全。
description.en: This course is to have experts on API(Application Programming Interface) in financial technology practices to introduce students the real applications of API in financial technology. The contents include financial technology practices with application using API, innovative services design, blockchain applications and API introduction, API architecture, finance 3.0 and banking, finance 3.0 and securities, finance 3.0 and property insurance, finance 3.0 and life, and finance innovative applications and information security.

notes: 資財三四與資財所合開

name.zh: 太陽光電池應用與展望
name.en: Technical progress and future prospect on solar photovoltaic

description.zh: 本課程在教授學生太陽能光電科技及能源相關產業及製程技術之實務知識。課程設計將著重基礎太陽能光電科技知識的建立,首先介紹太陽能光電科技所應具備之基本知識,並教授能源材料的基本特性及原理以及目前應用概況.藉由說明太陽能電池之設計原理與效率提高準則為出發點，教導學生了解太陽能光電科技所應用到之材料基本特性及相關製作程序。本課程將由本校專任教師配合企業講師和技術實務專業教師演講,透過實例之講解及工廠參觀，引導學生了解應用領域及製造產業。期盼培育學生迅速進入太陽能光電及能源材料相關產業工作能力與競爭力。
description.en: The course is to provide the core knowledge for the development of solar energy technology. It intends to educate and train students with the fundamental theories and technical application of solar energy and solar- cell fabrication technology. The future prospect of photovoltaics will be revealed to help students understand strong demands in solar industries. The experienced industrial lectures will present the potential marketing, working principles of solar devices, and progress in commercialization of solar cells. Students will also be given the opportunities to on-site visit the solar-related industries.

description.zh: 本課程主要在論述計畫於都市發展過程的干預以及維護環境永續發展之分派與管理角色，其內容包括：    一、 規劃、規劃師與計畫    二、 1800年到1900年的都市發展    三、 都市計畫的先驅著    四、 戰後規劃的開創    五、 國土與區域計畫    六、 都市與都市區域計畫    七、 歐美的都市計畫    八、 未來聚落的都市規劃
description.en: This course is mainly to discuss the role of planning as a form of intervention in the development process, and introduce the role of planning in the allocation and management of a sustainable environment. Thus the course including:    1. Planning, planners and plans    2. The origins: urban growth from 1800 to 1940    3. The seers: pioneer thinkers in urban planning, from        1880 to 1945    4. The creation of the postwar planning machine, from        1940 to 1952    5. National/regional planning from 1945 to 1990    6. Planning for cities and city regions from 1945 to        1990    7. Planning in Western Europe, United States since 1945    8. Settlements into the 21st century

description.zh: 1.醫用電子學之基礎。2.生醫電物理化學之基礎。3.人體生理系統與經絡系統介紹。4.生醫系統電物理化學模型分析。5.醫用電探針、感測器元件與生物晶片的應用。6.量測理論與生醫電訊號量測技術。7.生醫電訊號處理技術。8.超音波、紅外線、X光、CT、磁振醫學造影原理與影像處理。9.醫用電子安全規格製訂。10.醫用醫療儀器與生化分析儀設計。11.DICOM、HL7醫療網路資訊系統介紹。12.中西醫工應用系列介紹。
description.en: 1.Fundamental of medical electronics。2.Fundamental of electro-physiology。3.Introduction to human body system and Meridian system。4.Electronic physics-chemical modeling analysis of   biomedical system。5.Applications of medical electrode、biosensor and biochip。 6.Medical measurement theory and technology。7.Processing technology of biomedical signals。8.Constructing and processing of ultrasound、infrared、X-ray  、CT and MRI Imaging。9.Safety specifications of medical electronic devices。10.Designs of biomed

description.zh: 課程大綱規劃主要依據上述的四部份分別進行授課，包含固態氧化物燃料電池之原理應用及檢測、潔淨能源技術、變頻式高效率交流液體技術與生質能及敏化染料太陽能技術，分別敘述如下：  1.潔淨能源技術能源概論，非再生能源與再生能源的利用能源的有效變換，未來能源的  發展形態有效能源之解析與評估，能源效率之管理。本課程主要是探討燃料電池的製程技術與發展。   a. 燃料電池製程技術介紹(Introduction)    b. 電池效率與開路電壓(Efficiency and Open Circuit Voltage)    c. 操作燃料與電壓(Operational Fuel and Voltage)    d. 中子交換薄膜燃料電池(Proton Exchange Membrane Fuel Cells)    e. 鹼性電解質燃料電池(Alkaline Electrolyte Fuel Cells)    f. 甲烷燃料電池(Direct Methanol Fuel Cells)    g. 中溫與高溫燃料電池(Medium and High Temperature Fuel Cells)   h. 燃料電池之燃料添加(Fuelling Fuel Cells)    i. 壓縮機、透平機、葉扇與?浦(Compressors, Turbines, Ejectors, Fans,   Blowers, and Pumps)    j. 燃料電池之動力輸送(Delivering Fuel Cell Power)    k. 燃料電池之系統分析(Fuel Cell Systems Analyzed)
description.en: This course clean energy covers the fundamentals and applications of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The fundamentals are introductory of the energy source principle and transfer mechanism of fuel cell, solar cell and biomass energy. The design and production technologies of the clean energy are introduced and discussed. The examples or other topics of clean energy applications and procedures as well as specifications of the testing are usually regardant in this introductory course.

description.zh: 本課程上半學期以R語言為工具，處理分析金融交易資料於股票期貨與選擇權等商品，包含理論模擬與實務分析。
description.en: In this course, we use R language as a tool to deal with the analysis of financial data in the stock, futures and options and other commodities, including theoretical simulation and practical analysis.
